paper_title.ja: ホテルの客室部分構成比と各事業主体のNPV最大化の二目的問題
paper_title.en: BI-OBJECTIVE OPTIMIZATION OF NPV MAXIMIZATION OF EACH INTEREST AND HOTEL FLOOR RATIO OF ROOM

description.ja: We took a "city hotel" as investment in a project, and used NPV of two relating interests, which are Owner and Manager, as indexes of evaluation. We then maximized the indexes by bi-objective optimization applying GA in order to get "the Ratio of Room to Common space" which satisfies each interest's profitability to a high degree. As a result, "the Ratio of Room to Common space" took various values in relation of game of two relating interests, and there is a trade-off relationship shown as distribution of population considered to be the "Pareto Optimal Set".
description.en: We took a "city hotel" as investment in a project, and used NPV of two relating interests, which are Owner and Manager, as indexes of evaluation. We then maximized the indexes by bi-objective optimization applying GA in order to get "the Ratio of Room to Common space" which satisfies each interest's profitability to a high degree. As a result, "the Ratio of Room to Common space" took various values in relation of game of two relating interests, and there is a trade-off relationship shown as distribution of population considered to be the "Pareto Optimal Set".

paper_title.ja: 近隣とのつきあいと視線によるプライバシーの被害意識の関係 : 転居地毎の居住経験のインタビュー
paper_title.en: THE RELATION BETWEEN THE ASSOCIATION WITH NEIGHBOURS AND THE CONSCIOUSNESS OF PRIVACY-Interview on the experience at each habitation where one has lived-

description.ja: In this study, from interview on 8 person (1〜2 hour for each), we tried to clarify following. "When people have no asociation with their neighbour, people has consciousness of their privacy by being seen from those who live in the houses effacing each other" well presents the situation that the consciousness of privacy occurs, but this is the rare case in the residents. And we find the following is more suitable for the relation between association with neighbours and the consciousness of privacy. "Even when people have no asociation with their neighbour, the consciousness doesn't occur.

paper_title.ja: 近江八幡市八幡伝建地区における居住者の建物の現状変更意向と世帯の特徴
paper_title.en: A STUDY ON THE RESIDENTS' INTENTIONS FOR RENOVATION AND CHARACTERISTICS OF HOUSEHOLD IN HACHIMAN CONSERVATION DISTRICT OF TRADITIONAL BUILDINGS

description.ja: In the Hachiman Conservation District of Traditional Buildings, the case study considered here, the townscape has been well-formed by the repair and reconstruction carried out under the conservation controls in effect. On the other hand, the townscape has been de- stroyed gradually by the renovation and demolition due to an increasing need for cars and changed of life style in traditional districts. Based on a questionnaire distributed to residents of the district, this study analyzes actual conditions of the renovation and residents' intentions for renovation and inheritance dwelling in the future. The study examined the problems of the conservation district and the influence on the transformation of the townscape.
description.en: In the Hachiman Conservation District of Traditional Buildings, the case study considered here, the townscape has been well-formed by the repair and reconstruction carried out under the conservation controls in effect. On the other hand, the townscape has been de- stroyed gradually by the renovation and demolition due to an increasing need for cars and changed of life style in traditional districts. Based on a questionnaire distributed to residents of the district, this study analyzes actual conditions of the renovation and residents' intentions for renovation and inheritance dwelling in the future. The study examined the problems of the conservation district and the influence on the transformation of the townscape.
